Info.title: About this Visualization
Info.icosahedron: This is an icosahedron, a polyhedron with 20 triangular faces. It's being rendered in real-time using a basic Three.js geometry, with its edges highlighted for a wireframe look.
Info.prism: This is a triangular-based prism, created from a cylinder geometry with only 3 segments. The interactivity and holographic appearance are controlled by React Three Fiber.
Info.globe: This 3D model (GLB) of a holographic globe was loaded dynamically. The GLTF/GLB format is the standard for transmitting 3D assets on the web because it is efficient and complete.
Info.hologram: This is a GLB model that includes animations. The Drei library makes it easy to control these embedded animations, allowing them to be played directly in the scene.
Info.black-dragon: This is a GLB model that includes animations. The Drei library makes it easy to control these embedded animations, allowing them to be played directly in the scene.
Info.tech: This scene was built with **React Three Fiber (R3F)**, which allows creating complex **Three.js** scenes declaratively with React components. Helpers from the **Drei** library were used to speed up development. Internationalization is managed by **next-intl**.
